title: Lemon drizzle traybake
description: I have been making lemon drizzle cake for as long as I can remember – since the 1960s at least! This is the recipe I am most asked for when stopped in the street, so here it is!Equipment and preparation: for this recipe you will need a 30x23cm/12x9in tray bake or roasting tin.
ingredients: 225g/8oz baking spread, straight from the fridge, or butter at room temperature, plus extra for greasing
1 heaped tbsp very finely chopped lemon verbena (optional)
